Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory161.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Three drumbeats.'}
{3: '"The midnight drums are beatin\'! We\'re closing up!"'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{2: "What's going on?", 3: '13', 4: "The ship's moving?", 5: '13'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "The ground's shaking?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...The ship has left the port.', 4: '3'}
{2: "Let's go check the deck.", 3: '16', 4: "Let's go investigate, Lee.", 5: '18'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The crowd is gone.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Apart from those already headed for the boarding gate, every merchant in the market seems to be going in the same direction.', 4: '3'}

{2: 'Lee', 3: "...The ship is some distance away from the port now. Even without considering the waterproof function of Constructs, it's not the kind of distance a human can hold their breath for.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Are you joking, Lee?', 3: '20', 4: "That's unrealistic.", 5: '21'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Yes, I would also advise against it.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'So what do we do now, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'We bide our time.', 3: '24', 4: 'We follow the merchants.', 5: '27'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "If this is really a night market, then by the looks of it, it's a well-organized one built on strict rules.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Which means it should have fixed open and close times and the ship should follow a fixed schedule.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'My thoughts exactly.', 3: '28', 4: 'We just have to wait until tomorrow night.', 5: '28'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'We need to find a place to hide on the ship.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Maybe we can catch up to the merchants aboard the ship, right Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory150.png'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'This looks like a warehouse. A central warehouse.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Are all the merchants' wares stored here?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "This doesn't seem like the Night Market on the database.", 4: '3'}
{2: "I've been here before.", 3: '37', 4: 'Watch out for the guards.', 5: '43'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...Who is it that kidnapped the commandant, and for what?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The kidnapper has not shown up or made another move.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Regardless, I won't let Commandant out of my sight again.", 4: '1'}
{2: "It's okay.", 3: '41', 4: "You don't have to watch me like that, Lucia.", 5: '42'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'm sorry, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Based on our last encounter, I\'ve made a brief scan of the "guards" on the boat.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Blubber and Ballwheel, mechanical puppet performers of the Acrobatics Series made by the General Toys Company after it was acquired during the Golden Age.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Not only are they not infected, but they are also surprisingly well maintained.', 4: '3'}

{2: 'Liv', 3: "...I haven't detected any sign of infection on all humans and mechanoids on the boat, but the responses from their bio-signals are all pretty weak. I'm concerned for their health...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I feel like this boat is hiding many secrets.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'If only we have more data to analyze...', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Maybe we can get some useful information from these mechanical puppets.', 4: '3'}
